description.value:
With a single shout, the shaman causes one target creature within 30 feet to become shaken for 1 round. A successful Will saving throw negates this effect.

At 8th level, she makes the target frightened instead.

At 16th level, she makes it panicked instead. This is a mind-affecting fear effect.

A creature affected by this hex cannot be affected by it again for 24 hours.
